Mouth: Rounded elevation size of a pea in center, with drawing sensation from center to hyoid bone
Female: Pain commences in middle of thighs
Dysmenorrhoea; blood discharged in drops with tenesmus

name: Castoreum
details: A great remedy for hysteria. Prostration marked. Hysterical symptoms. Day-blindness; cannot endure the light. Nervous women who do not recover fully, but are continually irritable, and suffer from debilitating sweats. Spasmodic affections after debilitating diseases. Constant yawning. Restless sleep with frightful dreams and starts.
